ing: 2 1/2 cups frozen pineapple chunks, or to taste
2 cups apple juice, or as needed
2 pears - peeled, cored, and cut into wedges
n: Strawberry, Pear, Pineapple, and Mint Smoothie
des: "For those who like icy all-fruit smoothies, this one offers a refreshing, complex blend of fresh flavors."
ins: Blend pineapple chunks, apple juice, pears, strawberries, and mint leaves together in a blender until smooth.
